title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Doug Gottlieb fills in for Colin to talk about the Bucks impressive come from behind win over the Celtics and what Giannis Antetokounmpo has in common with Michael Jordan at this point in his career. He discusses the current state of college sports with the explosion of name, image and likeness money and why there are more issues than people realize. Plus, former NFL scout John Middlekauff joins the show to address the 49ers quarterback situation and if they should be worried about QB Trey Lance. 

 

#douggottliebshow

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
